{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Rpi 3aplus3.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Single-board Computer |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.raspberrypi.org/products/raspberry-pi-3-model-a-plus/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = RPF |model = Raspberry Pi 3 |submodelappend = yes |submodel = Model A+ (512MB) |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = 2ABCB-RPI3AP |icid = 20953-RPI3A |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM2837;BCM2837B0; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 (v8) |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz<!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 0 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR2 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- 3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Elpida;B4432BBPA-1D-F; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;4.19.122;Raspbian
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1), |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.2 LE, HDMI 1.4, DFS, FCC radio module certified, Audio out (3.5 mm), GPIO, MicroSD Card slot, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, |addchip = 5 output Universal PMIC;Exar;MxL7704;;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Sony UK |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Ubuntu, LibreELEC, OSMC, RISK OS
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 11/15/2018 |estreldate = 11/30/2018 |estprice = 25 |upc = 0652508442181 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16813142022 |asin = B07KKBCXLY |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = United Kingdom
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = SDIO 3.0 |rad1chip1 = Cypress;CYW43455; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = none |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |acqam1 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad1ac = 433 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|RPF Raspberry Pi series|List of SBCs}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM2837B0 [[ARM]] (Cortex-A53) :Quad Core @1.4GHz; GPU: [[BCM]] ''VideoCore IV'' *Memory: 512MB (LPDDR2) SDRAM (''Elpida'') *Storage: TF card (max.128GB)/MMC card slot *WLAN: 802.11ac (1T1R), Bluetooth 4.2 LE *Ports: 1x USB 2.0 ports
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2018/11/15/raspberry-pi-3-model-a-plus-25-dollars/ ''Raspberry Pi 3 Model A+'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/new-raspberry-pi-a-board-shrinks-rpi-3b-features-to-hat-dimensions/ ''Raspberry Pi 3 Model A+'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
[[Category:English Documentation]]
